resources.string: \"Scientists called it a big bang, Chuck Norris called it an alarm clock.\";\"Some are a one man army, Chuck Norris is a one man dynasty.\";\"Chuck Norris was invited to the set of Man v Food. They had to cancel the show when he ate Adam Richman.\";\"Chuck Norris is able to count to infinity. Twice.\";\"The Hulk is based on Chuck Norris when he is in a good mood.\";\"If Chuck gets into a car accident (yeah right) His car will need some airbags to protect it from him.\";\"Chuck Norris can shoot a person 28 times with an unloaded gun.\";\"Chuck Norris shakes the pillars of heaven just for the hell of it\"
